about_the_game:
This game is created by Yahaha Studio with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

What Is the Game About:


As you open your eyes, it's already deep into the night, and once again, you find yourself waking up in the office due to overtime work. But tonight is different. Strange sounds fill the air, reminiscent of rodents gnawing on something. Wait! There's a rabbit wielding a knife, seemingly intent on ending your life. Now, you must use anything you can find to escape the confines of the office!

Can you outsmart the menacing rabbit and uncover the dark secrets hidden within the office walls? The clock is ticking, and the night grows darker with every passing moment. Utilize your surroundings, solve mind-bending puzzles, and discover the truth behind the haunting presence that lurks in the shadows.

Survival! Face the terror of being hunted by a knife-wielding rabbit. Your wits and resourcefulness are your only weapons against this relentless foe.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles to unlock new areas, discover crucial items, and piece together the mystery behind the office's dark secrets.

Engaging Storyline: Unravel the twisted narrative as you delve deeper into the nightmarish world of Horror Office. Each clue you uncover brings you closer to the truth.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Monster Evasion
  • Time-sensitive Gameplay
  • Intense Survival Horror

Designer's Comment:

Creating "Horror Office" has been a thrilling journey. The concept of transforming a mundane setting like an office into a nightmarish arena was both challenging and exciting. We wanted to play on the familiar yet eerie vibe of being alone in an office at night, amplifying the fear and suspense with the presence of a terrifying antagonist—a rabbit with a knife. Incorporating AI-powered tools with Yahaha Horror Game Kit into our design process allowed us to take our level design to the next level. These tools helped us build intricate and dynamic environments that adapt to players' actions, enhancing the immersion and unpredictability of the game. This technology enabled us to iterate quickly and refine the gameplay experience, making "Horror Office" a truly captivating and terrifying adventure.

The blend of psychological horror and survival elements aims to keep players on the edge of their seats, questioning every sound and shadow. Crafting the right atmosphere was crucial to our vision. Our team focused on creating detailed environments and using soundscapes to heighten the sense of dread. Every creak, whisper, and footstep was designed to immerse players deeper into the horror, making them feel vulnerable and tense.

The game is set to launch in Augest 2024! If you're interested, please add to your Steam wishlist — We'd really appreciate it, and it would be incredibly helpful. Please feel free to share your ideas and comments with us. Thanks again.
